descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#e69138][size=6]A Follower's Camp
[/size][size=5]IT'S BACK, MY FRIENDS
[/size][/color][size=4][color=#e69138](Special Edition Compatible)[/color]
[/size]

[size=5]This is a mod that adds a camp south of The Half-Moon Mill by lake Ilinalta for you and your followers to inhabit.[/size]



[size=5]A little backstory...
[/size][size=4]A Follower's Camp is a mod that I published once upon a time, in June of 2016. It raised a decent amount of attention and had many downloads from many wonderful people. I worked tirelessly on updating and patching the mod, until my motivation for it declined rapidly. I finally got my mojo back and decided to re-upload A Follower's Camp to the Skyrim Nexus. It's here, guys![/size]

[size=4]Also, I would like to give a huge shoutout and thanks my friend Aba42 for making all of this possible. I accidentally deleted my mod after I unpublished it and he mailed every bit of it back to me.
[/size]

[size=5]The camp contains:
[/size][size=4]guard towers
a player home
very safe walls[/size]
[size=4]a few small farms
a blacksmith merchant
a silver mine (incomplete)
also, an apothecary merchant
and every possible crafting station I could think of[/size]


[size=5]A few notes:
[/size][size=4]1.) I am currently working on a completely new, custom-made silver mine to replace the placeholder. Yay! 
2.) The camp is still in great development. There can be lots of bugs so bare with me, guys. 
3.) I will leave older versions up for download if you do not want a larger campsite. 
4.) This mod has been cleaned with TES5Edit, I hope you guys don't encounter crashing issues in the future. [/size]
[size=4]    


[/size][size=5]Known Incompatibilities[/size]
[size=4](mods that do not work with this mod)
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41852/?][size=4][/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41852/?][size=4]Aurora Village[/size][/url]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79307/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D79307%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D4932020&pUp=1]Immersive Bandit Camps[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start - Live Another Life[/url] (It will work, but place Alternate Start at the bottom of your load order)
Grass mods can interfere with the camp grounds. There is no way for me to fix this. Sorry!
[/size][size=4]

[/size]



[size=5]Patch & Update Notes
[/size]
[size=4]Version 0.1 - Added the camp Version 0.5 - Added a second partition to the camp; three farms, a second dock, a witch hut, third camp gate, grindstone, smelter, cart, and fixed some floating objects.
[/size]
[size=4]Version 0.6 - Finished and fine-tuned Navmeshes, added a lot more clutter, removed leek farm, added large adventurer's tent, added light to the campfires, and added light posts.
[/size]
[size=4]Patch 0.69 - Finalized Navmesh (Followers can now move between cells without getting stuck, less problems for you guys), added a little bit more Navmesh where it was needed, and fixed object positions.
[/size]
[size=4]Version 0.7 - Added more clutter, moved the teleport marker so when you fast travel to the camp, you spawn outside of it, added Silver Mine (Broken-Wrist Mine), readjusted Navmesh, and fixed a few things.
[/size]
[size=4]Version 0.8 - Added more clutter and small, bridged island with a player home & dock on it. Added a lot of idle positions to the camp (like leaning on a wall or sitting on a rock).

Version 0.81 - Added 2 new merchant NPCs. Fixed some object positions and moved a few things around. Added more clutter and stuff.

[/size]

[size=4]WARNING: The silver mine in Version 0.7 is only a placeholder and may have some visual errors, such as disappearing walls and floors. WARNING: If you are updating this mod, remove all of your personal items from the camp's containers before you update. Otherwise, you will lose them.
[/size]

[size=5]Version Expansions
[/size]
[size=4]Version 0.1 - Base Camp, smallest version Version 0.5 - Added an expansion, camp is twice as big as version 0.1

Version 0.6 - No expansion added, same size as version 0.5

Version 0.69 - No content added (Just a patch update)

Version 0.7 - Added Silver Mine (Broken-Wrist Mine), no camp expansion added, camp is the same size as version 0.5

[/size][size=4]Version 0.8 - Added a small island with a player home on it, camp is slightly larger than version 0.7 

Version 0.81 - No expansion added, version is the same size as version 0.8



[/size][size=6]Thank you all for downloading and endorsing. It means a lot! <3[/size][/center]
author: Spectrosity
